org.drombler.commons.context

Class ProxyContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drombler.commons.context.AbstractContext
      • org.drombler.commons.context.ProxyContext
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Context

    public class ProxyContext
extends AbstractContext
    A Context which proxies other contexts.
    Author:
    puce

    • Method Detail

      • find

        public <T> T find(Class<T> type)
        Finds an instance of the specified type in this context. If this context has more than one instance of the specified type, the first one found will be returned.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the specified type
        Parameters:
        type - the specified type
        Returns:
        the first instance found in this context with the specified type, or null if no instance was found.

      • findAll

        public <T> Collection<T> findAll(Class<T> type)
        Finds all instances of the specified type in this context.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the specified type
        Parameters:
        type - the specified type
        Returns:
        a collection with all instances found in this context with the specified type, or an empty collection if no instance was found

      • addContextListener

        public <T> void addContextListener(Class<T> type,
                                   ContextListener<T> listener)
        Registers a ContextListener for a specified type. The listener will be notified when instances of the specified type get added or removed.
        Specified by:
        addContextListener in interface Context
        Overrides:
        addContextListener in class AbstractContext
        Type Parameters:
        T - the specified type
        Parameters:
        type - the type to listen for
        listener - the ContextListener

      • removeContextListener

        public <T> void removeContextListener(Class<T> type,
                                      ContextListener<T> listener)
        Unregisters a ContextListener for a specified type.
        Specified by:
        removeContextListener in interface Context
        Overrides:
        removeContextListener in class AbstractContext
        Type Parameters:
        T - the specified type
        Parameters:
        type - the type to listen for
        listener - the ContextListener

      • addContext

        public void addContext(Context context)
        Adds another Context to be proxied by this context.
        Parameters:
        context - a Context to be proxied

      • addContexts

        public void addContexts(Collection<Context> contexts)
        Adds a collection of Contexts to be proxied by this context
        Parameters:
        contexts - the contexts to be proxied

      • removeContext

        public void removeContext(Context context)
        Removes a Context from being proxied by this context
        Parameters:
        context - the context to removed

      • setContexts

        public void setContexts(Context... contexts)
        Sets the contexts to be proxied by this context. This will remove all contexts registered before.
        Parameters:
        contexts - the contexts to be proxied

      • setContexts

        public void setContexts(List<? extends Context> contexts)
        Sets the contexts to be proxied by this context. This will remove all contexts registered before.
        Parameters:
        contexts - the contexts to be proxied

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Indicates if this proxy has some contexts.
        Returns:
        true, if the proxy has no contexts, else false
